channel.title: Adhesive Tape Series on Herfom

item.title: Packing Tape
item.description: Material Optional OPP / BOPP We recommend BOPP (High Strength) Features BOPP material: Strong, Not easy to break, Strong stickiness Suitable for: Packing and sealing, repairing, binding and fixing, packaging of goods. Color Color Other Color Please contact sales Yellow Milky White Other Color Please contact sales Specification The following is the regular size, other sizes can be customized.

item.title: Masking Tape
item.description: Features No damage to the wall, no residue, easy to tear without leaving traces. Used for car beauty, interior decoration paint spray paint cover, fix light objects, and remove lint. item.title: Electrical Tape
item.description: Feature It is made of PVC film as the base material and coated with rubber pressure sensitive adhesive. It has good insulation, flame resistance, voltage resistance, cold resistance and other characteristics. Used for leakage and insulation tape, suitable for wire connection and electrical insulation protection Specification Width(mm) Length(m) Other Size Please contact sales 19 20 19 30 19 22 Other Size Please contact sales

item.title: Kraft Paper Tape
item.description: Material Kraft Paper Hot melt adhesive (please consult sales if you need oil glue or rubber) Features Strong stickiness, The initial adhesion is very good, not easy to deteriorate, and does not warp Great adhesion, convenient operation, non-toxic and tasteless It has the characteristics of environmental protection, temperature resistance, water resistance, easy tearing, cold resistance, etc. High peel strength, strong tensile force Color Brown Specification The following is the regular size, other sizes can be customized.
